title: Parineeti Chopra’s midnight smoky eyes

Smoky eyes never fail to steal the show, no matter who chooses to flaunt them. It is edgy, a favourite among most makeup mavens, and holds the power to transform any beauty look with panache. While the trend is popular and easily achievable, it also leaves room for a lot of experimentation. Parineeti Chopra owns her smoky eyes with navy blue and silver hues, creating a dreamy look. Her eye makeup is captivating and makes use of the right amount of colour in the right places. You too could experiment with this midnight smoky eye trend, all you have to do is follow this simple decode.• Cleanse, tone and moisturise your skin; apply a lip balm.• Use a primer to prep your face for foundation.• Dab on a mattifying foundation on your face and neck. Blend well.• Conceal blemishes and the under-eye area with a concealer.• Apply an eyeshadow primer to your lids.• Using a flat brush, apply a navy blue eyeshadow along the upper and lower lash line. Blend upwards.• Top up the navy blue shadow with silver eyeshadow.• Smudge black kohl with a sponge tool on the upper and lower lash line.• Use generous amounts of volumising mascara.• Fill in your eyebrows with an eyebrow pencil and blend it in with a spoolie brush.• Brush on a pinkish coral blush to the apples of your cheeks.• Wear a fruity pink matte lipstick on your lips.• Set the look with a spritz of makeup setting spray.
